name: Recyx... Will they find the energy needed?
blurb: Evolutive Survival Community Game. A MMORTS like; Build, Fight, Survive, in a post apocalyptic scenario, with robots called Recyx.

rewards.reward: KICKER: Exclusive access to the beta.\r\nExtented trial version. Exclusive WallPapers. \r\nSPECIAL THANKS in game credits as Pledger.

FOUNDER: Exclusive access to the beta(and for all higher rewards too). Full copy of the Game : Digital product. Founder Title. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as Player Pledger. Note that the regular game price will be up to 20$ after the release!

GREAT FOUNDER: Full copy of the Game : Digital product. +70 Copex in your account. Great Founder Title - Exclusive to pledgers. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Great Founder and Player Pledger. A Tree will be plant in your name by us!

********* BEST VALUE *********                                       MASTER FOUNDER: Full copy of the Game: Digital product. +100 Copex in your account. One exclusive Poster of your choice. Master Founder Title - Exclusive to pledgers. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Master Founder and Player Pledger. A Tree will be plant in your name by us!
FOUNDER PACK: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game : Digital product. Founder Title. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as Player Pledger. 4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

ENLISTED FOUNDER: Full copy of the Game: Digital product. Enlisted Founder Title. One exclusive Recyx Poster of your choice. One T-Shirt of your choice. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Enlisted Founder and Pledger. A Tree will be plant in your name by us!

BEST HOPE: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Best Hope and Pledger. Both exclusive Recyx Poster of your choice. 4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

BELIEVERS: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Believers and Pledger. Both Exclusive Recyx Poster.\r\nOne T-Shirt of your choice.\r\n4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

PIONEER: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. PioneerTitle for all account. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Guardian and Pledger. Both Exclusive Recyx Posters. Two T-Shirt of your choice. An area will carry your name. 4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

GUARDIAN: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. Guardian Title for all account. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Guardian and Pledger. Both Exclusive Recyx Posters. All three T-Shirt of your choice. An area will carry your name. 4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

BULLDOSER HELPER: Friends Pack: 4 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. Bulldoser Helper Title for all account. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Bulldoser Helper and Pledger. Exclusives Recyx Posters. All three T-Shirts+ Exclusive One. An area will carry your name. An area will carry the name of your choice. 4 Trees will be plant in your name by us!

DREAM LIFTER: 10 Full copy of the Game: Digital product. Dream Lifter Title for all account. SPECIAL THANKS in game credits as a Dream Lifter and Pledger. Exclusives Recyx Posters. All three T-Shirts + Exclusive One. An area will carry your name. An area will carry the name of your choice. A Tree will be plant in your name by us! You will choose and vote with others Dream Lifter for the next real Race Track in the world that we'll reproduce in game for one of the next PVP area.

RECYX TEAM MEMBER: Just like the project was build, you've give the minimum efforts or money that was needed to join the team at start. So now you are in and you will be added to the Recyx Team! Receive all previous rewards. Get a VIP place in our contact as an advisor for all further development on the game.We'll keep in touch! Be invited to our office (sharing the costs of the trip will be negociable) or for future master brainstorm about the game. You will be able to participate the way you would like to.
